divs: sighting detailsi was standing in my backyard having a cigarette and i saw what i thought was a lantern crossing the sky above the roof tops in my suburb gainig altitude and travelleling at some speed. i thought nothing of it. i walked to the other side of my garden and it appeared in the distance over my roof line travelling in a northwards direction gainig altitude and speed away from me and into the darkened clouds then disappearing. i wasn't sure at the time what it was. (bright orange orb). then i seen two more orange orbs following in a similar direction a 30 - 60 seconds between each sighting. the last was closer and seemed brighter but followed the same flight path as the first two. there was no noise i could hear. i was fixated on them and unfortunetley didn't get any pictures.i just stared at them and was trying to work out what i could be seeing. i dismiss them being a lantern as they were really bright orange and disappeared from view within a minute. also there was hardly any wind. quite a freaky experience as i have never seen anything like this before. hopefully i won't be the only person reporting this as i live in a populated area of melbourne. this sighting has happened at night, the only feature i could see was the bright orange orbs. the date is the 14\06\2013. sighting ocurred at 10.15pm
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Berwick
There were no other sightings in Berwick on or around June 14th 2013
